edit-prefix-dlg.jcr:title: Set a Context Prefix for this Redirect Configuration

contentPrefix.fieldDescription: This context prefix will be added to all Redirect Rules in this configuration.
contentPrefix.name: ./contextPrefix

evaluateURI.name: ./evaluateURI
evaluateURI.fieldDescription: Checking this box will allow the Redirect Manager to evaluate the request URI instead of the resource path, and take into account other URI parts (like suffix, ...)

effectiveFrom.emptyText: the time when the redirect should go live
effectiveFrom.name: ./effectiveFrom

untilDate.emptyText: the time when the redirect should stop working
untilDate.name: ./untilDate

tags.emptyText: optional tags to categorise redirect rules
tags.name: ./cq:tags
